A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have a Star Wars toys that I've had for almost 40 years that I now have to toss in the garbage. Johnson And Disney have messed up part of my childhood. It's crazy how much I have been thinking about this horrible movie \nAnd how depressed I am. I have been through a divorce and that feels like a death\, somewhat the way this movie has made me feel. The  prequel's were bad but The Force Awakens helped to redeem the mess that was created. I don't see a way for any type of Redemption\,  especially now that Disney and Johnson wanted this. Very sad.
